SELECT SUM (commission) as total FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN a.percentage > b.manage_reward THEN b.manage_reward_range1 + a.percentage * b.manage_reward_range2 ELSE a.percentage * b.manage_reward_range2 END AS commission FROM odv_percentage a LEFT JOIN sys_percent b ON b.client = a.line WHERE a.line IN (SELECT client FROM sys_percent WHERE enable IN ('特殊1','阶梯累加')) AND a.line_date = dbo.fnFormatDate(GETDATE() , 'yyyy-MM') AND a.percentage >= b.manage_reward AND a.odv = #{odv} GROUP BY a.percentage,b.manage_reward,b.manage_reward_range1,b.manage_reward_range2) as a
SELECT sum(repay_amt) as repayAmt FROM odv_percentage WHERE line IN ( SELECT client FROM sys_percent WHERE enable = '阶梯累加' ) AND line_date = dbo.fnFormatDate(GETDATE() , 'yyyy-MM') AND odv = #{odv}
SELECT sum(repay_amt) as repayAmt FROM odv_percentage WHERE line IN ( SELECT client FROM sys_percent WHERE enable = '特殊1' ) AND line_date = dbo.fnFormatDate(GETDATE() , 'yyyy-MM') AND odv = #{odv}
